melody_to_vocals.feature_description: Transform your hummed melodies into professional vocals with AI-generated lyrics

audio_upload.title: Upload Melody
audio_upload.tooltip: Upload a recording of you humming or singing a melody. Works best with 5-15 seconds of clear audio.
audio_upload.help_text: Tip: Record in a quiet space for best results

prompt.title: Song Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Describe what you want the song to be about. Example: 'A love song about summer nights'
prompt.help_text: Be specific but concise (1-2 sentences works best)

genre.title: Genre
genre.tooltip: Select the musical genre for your lyrics. This influences word choice, themes, and style.

mood.title: Mood
mood.tooltip: Set the emotional atmosphere of your song. This guides the AI's creative direction.
mood.help_text: Optional but recommended for better results

theme.title: Theme
theme.tooltip: The main subject or topic of the song. Examples: love, freedom, personal growth
theme.help_text: Optional - helps focus the lyrical content

ai_provider.title: AI Provider
ai_provider.tooltip: Choose which AI generates the lyrics. Claude is more creative, GPT-4 is more structured.
ai_provider.help_text: Both produce excellent results - try each to find your preference

vocal_model.title: Vocal Model
vocal_model.tooltip: Choose the AI model for vocal synthesis. Bark is faster with clearer lyrics, MusicGen sounds more musical.
vocal_model.help_text: Try Bark first for clarity, MusicGen for more musical results

extracting.title: Extracting Melody
extracting.message: Analyzing your audio to identify the melody...

generating_lyrics.title: Generating Lyrics
generating_lyrics.message: AI is writing lyrics that match your melody...

synthesizing.title: Synthesizing Vocals
synthesizing.message: Creating professional vocals with the generated lyrics...

audio_player.tooltip: Listen to your AI-generated vocals. Click to play/pause.

lyrics_display.title: Generated Lyrics
lyrics_display.tooltip: These lyrics were created to match your melody's rhythm and structure

melody_info.title: Melody Analysis
melody_info.tooltip: Details about your melody extracted by AI

fields.notes: Number of distinct notes in your melody
fields.duration: Length of the melody in seconds
fields.range: Pitch range from lowest to highest note

download.tooltip: Download the generated vocal track (MP3 format)

regenerate.tooltip: Generate a new version with different lyrics
regenerate.help_text: Uses the same melody but creates new lyrics

no_melody.title: Could Not Extract Melody
no_melody.message: We couldn't detect a clear melody in your audio.
suggestions: Hum or sing louder and more clearly
Ensure your melody is audible throughout
Try a different audio format (WAV recommended)

api_error.title: Processing Error
api_error.message: Something went wrong while generating your vocals.

file_too_large.title: File Too Large
file_too_large.message: Your audio file is too large (max 10MB).
suggestions: Use a lower bitrate or sample rate

recording: Record in a quiet room for best results
Hum or sing clearly and confidently
prompts: Examples: 'A love song about summer nights'
Think about what you'd tell a songwriter
parameters: Genre affects lyrical style and vocabulary
Try different combinations to explore options
